partintro.simpara: The aspell functions allows you to check the spelling on a word and offer suggestions.

note.simpara: aspell works only with very old (up to .27.* or so) versions of aspell library. Neither this module, nor those versions of aspell library are supported any longer. If you want to use spell-checking capabilities in php, use pspell instead. It uses pspell library and works with newer versions of aspell.

partintro.simpara: You need the aspell library, available from: &url.aspell;.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: aspell_new opens up a new dictionary and returns the dictionary link identifier for use in other aspell functions. Returns &false; on error.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: aspell_check checks the spelling of a word and returns &true; if the spelling is correct, &false; if not.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Check a word without changing its case or trying to trim it [deprecated]

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: aspell_check_raw checks the spelling of a word, without changing its case or trying to trim it in any way and returns &true; if the spelling is correct, &false; if not.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: aspell_suggest returns an array of possible spellings for the given word.
